name: df-chp
body: |- wceq(cchp, cmpt(s0, cr, csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, cv(s0))), cfv(cvma, cv(s1)))))
comment: Define the second Chebyshev function, which adds up the logarithms of the primes corresponding to the prime powers less than ` x ` , see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 75. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)
